testimonials.title: Happy Customers, Happy Families
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from families who found their dream cars

story1.name: The Johnson Family
story1.quote: Our kids absolutely love the spacious interior! The whole process was smooth and transparent. We saved over $8,000 compared to local dealers.

story2.name: Ahmed & Family
story2.quote: The inspection report gave us complete confidence. When the car arrived, it was even better than expected. My wife was so happy!

story3.name: The Martinez Family
story3.quote: Perfect family SUV! The delivery to our door was so convenient. Our Sunday drives have never been more enjoyable.

about.title: About Careal
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner for Chinese Used Cars Worldwide

company.title: Company Introduction
company.intro: Careal specializes in exporting certified pre-owned vehicles from China to individual customers worldwide. We focus on Chinese new energy vehicles and popular brands like BYD, Chery, Geely, and Great Wall, offering affordable, quality cars with full transparency.
company.achievement: Since our establishment, we've helped over 5,000 families find their perfect cars, with vehicles delivered to 40+ countries. Our mission is simple: make buying a quality used car from China safe, affordable, and hassle-free.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's most trusted platform for buying certified Chinese used cars, especially new energy vehicles.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Transparency First, Customer Success, Quality Over Quantity, Innovation in Service

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Help families worldwide access affordable, high-quality Chinese vehicles through transparent inspections and reliable delivery.

warehouses.title: Global Warehouse Network
warehouses.subtitle: Local warehouses for faster delivery and easy inspection before final purchase

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: Every vehicle comes with a detailed third-party inspection report. We handle all logistics, customs, and paperwork. Your satisfaction is guaranteed through transparent pricing and honest communication.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Professional third-party inspection reports for every vehicle

price.title: Best Prices
price.description: Direct from China, no middlemen, wholesale pricing

support.title: Full Support
support.description: From inquiry to delivery, we handle everything for you

experience.title: EV Expertise
experience.description: Specialists in Chinese new energy and electric vehicles

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

form.name: Your Name
form.success: Thank you! We will contact you soon.

footer.description: Find your perfect used car from China. Certified quality, unbeatable prices, delivered to your door worldwide.
